Internal development opportunities - a wide variety of units and departments promise versatile tasks.    an extensive company health management    You have at your disposal     a successfully completed university degree in computer science, administrative informatics or business informatics or    a successfully completed university studies or equivalent skills and experience.    and     Many years (at least three years) of professional experience in the IT field. Result and goal orientation, especially analytical thinking skills.    Cooperation and conflict skills, in particular the ability to deal with conflicts. description: Application Developer (m/f/d)     Messe München is one of the world's most important trade fair organizers, staging more than 50 of its own trade fairs at the exhibition center, the MOC Veranstaltungscenter München, the ICM - Internationales Congress Center München, CCN - Conference Center Nord and abroad. With over 600,000 square meters of exhibition space and a state-of-the-art exhibition center, Messe München is one of the largest trade fair venues in Germany.    Do you like to implement exciting integration projects with modern tools and technologies such as Talend, Elastic Stack, Apache Camel, Kafka, Karaf and the like? You love to work in a team with developers that is agile, passionate and professional? Then come and join us!    At our company, you will take care of approximately 250 interfaces between more than 30 systems together with a team of developers. You will work with colleagues who take on the challenges of the business units and processes with commitment. Your team members create creative solutions using the latest developer tools and methods and are real nerds at heart.    For our central IT department, Application Development, we are looking for an Application Developer (m/f/d) as soon as possible . The position is a full-time, permanent position.  Your tasks:   You will be responsible for the development of interfaces based on modern and innovative interface technologies    You will be involved in the entire application lifecycle from requirements analysis and conception to the delivery of software components    You create future-oriented solutions while guaranteeing code quality    You are in charge of monitoring the latest technology trends; in doing so, you will contribute your knowledge to the further development of our processes    You have the technical and functional advice of the development team as well as other departments and product owners under you    What we offer you:   A motivated and dedicated team in which collegial support is paramount    Responsibility in a diverse work environment with exciting and challenging tasks    International and national customers and projects    Diverse individual internal and external development and training opportunities    Attractive and extensive social benefits (company pension plan, travel allowance, childcare allowance, canteen, etc.)    Active health management (own health studio, mobile company fitness, bike leasing).    Mobile working and workation    Promotion of social commitment with 2 days of special leave per year    Ideally, this is what you bring with you:   A degree in computer science or business informatics or a successfully completed training.    You have several years of experience in the field of interface development    Mastery of Java, XML, SOAP, REST web services and ideally knowledge of Elastic Stack, PostgreSQL and Apache Camel are a given for you    You have an interest in technical challenges and the development and implementation of creative solutions    Fun to work in a small team and openness to agile development methods are a must for you    business fluent German and a sound knowledge of written and spoken English are no problem for you? Then you are our candidate (m/f/d). Apply now! We are looking forward to you!    The job ad appeals to you, but you do not meet all the requirements at first glance? Apply anyway, because we offer numerous development measures where you learn everything that is relevant to the job.
